wikipedia_page.main: Joy E Newman (born 17 November 1945) is a British former diver.

Diving at the 1966 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
response: Australia missed out on a clean sweep of silver medals when Beverly Boys of Canada beat Australia's Susan Knight in the women's 3 metre springboard by a score of just 0.02. Australia also missed out on a gold medal by the same score of just 0.2 in the women's 10 metre platform, with England's Joy Newman finishing just ahead of Australia's Robyn Bradshaw.
